Kristi

full_threads.body:
Hi Kristi,

Hope all is well. We have updated the ' Our People' page on both the Global and AU sites.

Here are the links:
Global - https://acoufelt.com/about-us/meet-our-team/
AU - https://acoufelt.com/au/about-us/meet-our-team/

Let us know if you would like further changes.
@glen can you please check this, thanks!

Can you send me a link to the draft page? When I try to review in Wordpress, I still see this. I'm not familiar enough with the program to do much more than review so perhaps I'm not in the right spot. I tried Clear Cache but the same Ron image appears.

Hi Kristi,

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

full_threads.body:
